name: Everpath: A pixel art roguelite
description: Everpath is a roguelite RPG with hand-crafted pixel art, explore a procedural generated world with the combat and item system of the classics action RPGs. Embark yourself as a member of the Northbarrow army, choose and personalize your class to find what is lurking in the wilderness of...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP minimum Processor: 1Ghz or faster Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB graphics Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 minimum Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB graphics Storage: 50 MB available space
